name: Flying Futuristic Car Battle
description:
Flying futuristic car is a flying car simulator and fast driving car adventure that can turn your furious 3D futurictic games passion into reality. It’s a package of full fighting having gunship car and airstrike with the plus of police chase too. Are you a good hands-on with the Flying Car Simulation? Make sure you cuff-up to give your best for it is going to be a full fighting challenge and especially the dangerous police chase will require a heavy evasion as it’s one heck of furious 3D futuristic game with utterly fast driving car control.

Flying futuristic car is more of a remote control simulation and it sells all the thrill and chill you are looking for in the decade. Flying futuristic car is a different composition of excitement, fast driving car control with flying car simulator variety, deadly police chase and full fighting spirits with advanced gunship car constituent which is a must in furious 3D futuristic games.

GAME FEATURES:
• Impressive Graphics
• City traffic and realistic background
• Thrilling speed
• All Car functionalities
• On-toes activity
• Sharp reflexive talent
• In App Purchases
• No Internet required and much more
